headline.main: SHOWDOWN LOOMS ON NEUTRALITY ACT; Hull Says Question Is Up to Capitol Hill, Primarily -- Repeal Forces Gain

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Sept. 29 -- Administration forces appeared today to be moving for a quick showdown on repeal or modification of the Neutrality Law so that American ships, under their own protection, may deliver lease-lend material directly to belligerent ports or wherever else they may be most effective in stopping Axis aggression.
abstract: Hull comments; Connally gives views, radio s
